subtitle: Exponential moving average — faster trend line.

measures.how_to_read: Price above EMA suggests bullish bias; EMA crossovers can mark shifts.
measures.caveats: More sensitive than SMA; whipsaws more in chop.
measures.what_it_measures: Exponential moving average of price to track trend.

step_by_step: Use slope or cross as confirmation

assistant_hints: Treat EMA as bias and dynamic level; not a guarantee.
Use slope and distance to judge quality of pullbacks.
Pair with higher timeframe EMA to avoid counter‑trend trades.
Avoid repeated entries if price grinds sideways around EMA.
beginner_summary: Exponential moving average — faster trend line.
